name: foundation socks
notes:
there’s nothing like having a strong foundation. it doesn’t matter what you’re doing; if you’re foundation isn’t strong, you’re going to struggle. this is my version of a vanilla sock and the foundation i keep returning to whenever i’m knitting socks. i hope this pattern helps strengthen your foundation in sock knitting as well.

this pattern is written for the magic loop but can be adapted to your favorite sock knitting technique.

are you more of a visual learner? make sure you check out my tutorials on [youtube][1]!


  [1]: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=plxfvbottf2h1pvf3uiyqf0cy_orhr_ct1&si=rfndmevxbq6ijkkc
